posts.post_content:
I am doing a one-of-each-player set of the B18 blankets.  Is anybody else working on this?  Here is what I need:

4 Austin, 6 Bassler,10 Carey, 11 Cavanaugh, 13 Chapman,  17 Coveleski, 19 Daubert, 21 Doak, 22 Dolan, 25 Foster, 26 Gainor, 29 Gowdy, 30 Graney, 33 Hamilton, 35 Huggins, 37 Hyatt, 41 Kavanaugh, 
43 Kelley, 48 Maranville,49 McAllister,52 Milan,59 Mowrey,60 Murray, 61 Olson, 62 O'Neil,65 Perdue, 66 Pratt, 67 Robinson, 68 Rucker, 69 Sallee, 70 Shanks, 72 Smith, 
74 Steele, 76 Sweeney, 78 Turner, 80 Viox, 81 Wagner, 83 Dee Walsh, 84 Jimmy Walsh, 86 Wheat, 87 Whitted, 88 Williams,89 Wilson

Will buy or trade.  Here are my dupes:  Demmitt, Fletcher, Griffith, Jackson, Morgan, Tyler, Whaling

Condition not important.

Let me know if you have any available.

Thanks,

Mac
